import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Left = () => { const clickMenuLeftLiHandle = (e) => { let allLis = e.target.closest("li").parentNode.children for(let i = 0; i < allLis.length; i++){ allLis[i].classList.remove('on') } e.target.closest("li").classList.add('on') let currentIndex = [].indexOf.call(allLis,e.target.closest("li")) let allMenuLists = document.getElementsByClassName('menu-list')[0].childNodes let currentMenuList = document.getElementsByClassName('menu-list')[0].childNodes[currentIndex] currentMenuList.classList.add('on') } return (
